Jeremy Stevens"Stonewall"HT: 6'0"
WT: 195lbs Season W/L record (1-1)Marcus Ruhl"The Titan"HT: 5'11"WT: 200lbsSeason W/L record (0-0) Two muscled gods enter the Naked Kombat arena today. Returning to the mat after his first loss is Jeremy "Stonewall" Stevens going toe to toe with bodybuilding stud Marcus "Titan" Ruhl. Marcus has a solid strategy to shove his big, uncut cock deep in both of Jeremy's holes, but not until he has his way with him in the first three rounds. Stonewall's prepared to hold nothing back and slam his opponent's ass to the mat. After two grueling rounds, the two fighters are oiled down as they fight for sexual glory and not to mention the bragging rights. The stakes are high and in the end only one man can come out on top, while the other gets turned into the winner's bitch for the day.
title: Marcus "Titan" Ruhl vs Jeremy "Stonewall" Stevens - Muscled Oil Match!
